originalText.text: My experience of this business, it’s very satisfied. I when to many other places and no one could take care my problem with the AC and I when to Rafael A/C  heater Repair and they took good care of me, and the prices is the best on town. originalText.text:
I was having issues with the AC in my car blowing warm air recently. Rafael AC Repair was able to quickly diagnosis the problem, find replacement parts, and complete all necessary repairs to get my AC working like new again. They were extremely professional, explained everything clearly, and did high quality work at a fair price.

Rafael, the owner, ensured the work was done right and that I was completely satisfied with the results. He and his team were friendly, knowledgeable, and highly efficient. They had my car for 3 hours to replace parts, recharge the AC and get everything functioning perfectly. It's clear they value quality work and customer satisfaction.

I would highly recommend Rafael AC Repair to anyone needing air conditioning service or repair for their vehicle. They were able to fix the issue quickly, stand behind their work, and deliver an overall hassle-free experience as a customer. I will definitely be taking my own car as well as recommending them to my family and friends for any AC needs going forward. Superior service at a reasonable cost - you can't ask for more than that in an auto repair shop!

If you live in the area and have an AC issue with your vehicle, don't hesitate to contact Rafael AC Repair. You won't find a more competent, affordable and reputable shop to get your air conditioning working like new again. First class operation!

originalText.text: A/C messed up. Need a quick fix? This guy will get it done quick and easy. If you scared to go to a mechanic shop because your scared of being scammed come see Rafael for an affordable and sustainable fix.

originalText.text: Had a leakage issue with my AC. Called in 2 other companies to fix it and they made it worse so I found this one and he finally fixed my problem!! Excellent and expeditious service!

originalText.text: My A/C was not working at all! Went to Rafael and they fix my issue right away. Don’t think it twice these guys will take care of you, don’t let the hot summer ruin your day! Go get your A/C fixed!
